ground_truth: David reaches for it, loses it, sees it again, and at the third attempt, grasps it. Above the pole, bright lights shine into the pool. David struggles to the surface, clinging to the pole, lets go of it to claw his fingers over the pool edge. The pole slides away, and David hangs on grimly for a moment before hauling himself out of the water and crawling painfully slowly away from it. The two children are standing a few paces away, drenched by the rain, watching him. The pole is lying on the ground between them. David stands and looks at them. Liquid splashes onto the woman's bruised and bloody wrists, bound tightly by twists of wire. Looming over her, beer bottle in hand, the huge maintenance man spits a stream of liquid at her bruised face. David closes on him from behind, throws his left arm around the man's neck, and clamps his wrists with his other hand. The man tears at the choking arm, and slams David back into the bedroom wall. David's back leaves a dent in the plaster wall. The man tries to throw him off, but David squeezes his throat relentlessly. The man jabs him viciously in the ribs with his elbow, lifts him again, but can't escape the arm across his throat. He staggers across the room, lifting and twisting David, still trying to throw him off. They reel across the room and he smashes David into the wall again. He thrashes about, pulling desperately at the arm locked around his neck, and makes another backward rush into the wall before falling forward onto his knees. He rises off balance and David drags him back down. He sinks to the floor and David tightens his grip yanking against the man's neck. David throws off the inert form and the maintenance man falls face down, motionless. David crosses to the woman and quickly untwists the wire from her wrists. When they are free, her arms flop down. David steps back and the woman slumps sideways onto the floor, limp and unreacting. He stands over her, still in his cape, gazing down at her. David gently opens a closet door. Audrey's sleeping body in a white night dress is carried from the shadowy light of her room to the foot of the stairs. She opens her eyes in the brighter light of the hall, and lifts her head as David carries her up the staircase. She watches him, smiling very faintly, her long, fair hair falling back from her white forehead, and the light making a silver line of her profile, emphasizing her aquiline features, as she stares steadily up at him. He carries her along the landing and into the bedroom, where he lays her softly on the bed.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: David reaches for it, loses it, sees it again, and finally grasps it on the third try. Bright lights illuminate the pool from above. Clinging to the pole, David struggles to the surface and claws his fingers over the pool edge, letting the pole slide away. He hangs on briefly before hauling himself out, crawling slowly away. Two drenched children stand nearby, watching him. The pole lies between them. David stands, observing them. Liquid splashes onto the woman's bruised wrists bound with wire. The large maintenance man looms over her, spitting liquid at her face. David approaches from behind, throws an arm around the man's neck, and secures his wrists. The man struggles, slamming David into the wall, leaving a dent. Despite this, David holds firm. The man elbows him viciously, but can't escape. Staggering, he tries to throw David off, smashing him into the wall again, but eventually sinks as David tightens his grip. David releases the motionless man and frees the woman's wrists. She slumps to the floor, limp. David, still in his cape, gazes down at her. He gently opens a closet. Audrey, in a white nightdress, is carried from her room to the stairs. She wakes, faintly smiling as David carries her up, her hair framing her face. He lays her softly on the bed.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: David reaches and misses twice before grasping the pole on his third attempt. Bright lights shine into the pool as he struggles to the surface, clings to the pole, and finally pulls himself out, crawling away slowly. Two drenched children watch him, with the pole on the ground between them. David stands, observing them. Liquid splashes onto a woman's bruised, bloody wrists bound by wire, as a huge maintenance man, beer bottle in hand, spits at her face. David approaches from behind, locking his arm around the man's neck. The man slams David into the wall, denting it, but David relentlessly squeezes his throat. The man jabs David's ribs and attempts to throw him off. They stagger across the room, the man struggling until he falls to his knees. David tightens his grip until the man falls motionless. David frees the woman's wrists; she slumps to the floor. He opens a closet, revealing Audrey asleep. Carrying her from the shadows to the stairs, she wakes, faintly smiling as he carries her to the bedroom and gently lays her on the bed.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
David reaches out in an attempt to grab it, but loses his grip. He catches sight of it again, and on his third try, successfully grasps it tightly. Above the pole, a series of bright, glaring lights shine down into the depths of the pool. Struggling with an arduous effort, David makes his way to the surface, holding onto the pole with determination. He then lets go of it in order to claw his fingers over the edge of the pool. As the pole slips away into the water, David hangs on tenaciously for a moment before he manages to haul himself out of the water, crawling away with painful slowness. Nearby, slightly away from the scene, the two children stand, completely drenched by the pouring rain, their eyes fixed on him intently. Between them, the pole lies discarded on the ground. David rises to his feet and directs his gaze toward them.

Meanwhile, liquid splatters onto a woman's wrists, which are bruised and bloody, tightly bound by coils of wire. Towering over her with a menacing presence, the huge maintenance man holds a beer bottle in his hand and spits a stream of liquid at her bruised face. David approaches him silently from behind, wraps his left arm around the man's thick neck, and secures his wrists with his other hand. The man frantically claws at the arm that constricts his throat, forcefully slamming David back into the hard surface of the bedroom wall. David's back leaves an indentation in the plaster wall. Despite the man's attempts to throw him off, David continues to squeeze his throat with unyielding pressure. The man viciously jabs his elbow into David's ribs, lifting him once more, yet fails to escape the relentless grip across his throat. Staggering across the room, the man lifts and twists David, still attempting to shake him off. They crash across the room as he slams David against the wall yet again. The man thrashes about wildly, desperately pulling at the arm locked around his neck, making another backward rush into the wall before collapsing forward onto his knees. Rising unsteadily, David drags him back down, and the man sinks to the floor as David tightens his grip, pulling against the man's neck with force. David then releases the inert form, and the maintenance man falls face down onto the floor, motionless and still.

David quickly crosses to the woman and untwists the tightly wound wire from her wrists. Once freed, her arms flop down helplessly. Stepping back, David observes as the woman slumps sideways onto the floor, limp and unreacting. He stands over her, his cape still draping his shoulders, and gazes down at her with a mix of emotions. Gently, David opens a closet door. Inside, Audrey lies sleeping, her body enveloped in a white nightdress, carried from the shadowy light of her room to the foot of the stairs. As David carries her up the staircase, she opens her eyes in the brighter light of the hall and lifts her head. Watching him intently, she smiles very faintly, her long, fair hair cascading back from her pale forehead. The light casts a silvery outline on her profile, accentuating her aquiline features as she maintains a steady gaze on him. David carries her with care along the landing and into the bedroom, where he gently lays her on the bed, ensuring she is comfortable and safe.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
David, with a determined resolve, reaches out in a desperate attempt to grab it, but unfortunately, he loses his grip. Once again, he catches sight of it, and on his third attempt, he successfully grasps it tightly. Above him, high above the pole, a series of bright, glaring lights shine down, casting an intense illumination into the depths of the pool. Struggling with tremendous and arduous effort, David makes his way to the surface, all the while holding onto the pole with unwavering determination. As he reaches the edge of the pool, he releases his grip on the pole to claw his fingers over the ledge. The pole slips away, disappearing into the water, while David hangs on tenaciously for a brief moment before he musters the strength to haul himself out of the water, crawling away with painful slowness. Nearby, slightly away from this dramatic scene, the two children stand completely drenched by the relentless pouring rain, their eyes fixed on him intently. Between the pair of them, the pole lies discarded and forgotten on the ground. David rises to his feet, directing his gaze toward the children.

Meanwhile, liquid splatters onto a woman's wrists, which appear bruised and bloody, tightly bound by cruel coils of wire. Towering over her with a menacing and intimidating presence, the huge maintenance man clutches a beer bottle in his hand, spitting a stream of liquid at her bruised and battered face. David approaches silently from behind, exhibiting stealth, and deftly wraps his left arm around the man's thick neck while securing the man's wrists with his other hand. The man frantically claws at the arm constricting his throat, forcefully slamming David backward into the hard surface of the bedroom wall. David's back collides with the wall, leaving an indentation in the plaster. Despite the man's desperate attempts to throw him off, David continues to squeeze his throat with unyielding and relentless pressure. The man viciously jabs his elbow into David's ribs, lifting him once more, but he still fails to escape the relentless grip across his throat. As he staggers across the room, the man lifts and twists David, still desperately trying to shake him off. They crash across the room as he slams David against the wall yet again. The man thrashes about wildly, desperately pulling at the arm locked around his neck, making another backward rush into the wall before finally collapsing forward onto his knees. Rising unsteadily, David drags him back down, and the man sinks to the floor as David tightens his grip, pulling against the man's neck with all his might. David then releases the inert form, and the maintenance man falls face down onto the floor, motionless and utterly still.

David quickly crosses over to the woman and untwists the tightly wound wire from her wrists. Once freed, her arms flop down helplessly by her side. Stepping back, David observes as the woman slumps sideways onto the floor, limp and unreacting. He stands over her, his cape still draping his shoulders, and gazes down at her with a complex mix of emotions. Gently, David opens the closet door. Inside, Audrey lies sleeping, her body enveloped in a delicate white nightdress, carried from the shadowy light of her room to the foot of the stairs. As David carries her with careful attention up the staircase, she opens her eyes in the brighter light of the hall and lifts her head. Watching him intently, she smiles very faintly, with her long, fair hair cascading back from her pale forehead. The light casts a silvery outline on her profile, accentuating her aquiline features as she maintains a steady, unwavering gaze on him. David carries her with tender care along the landing and into the bedroom, where he gently lays her down on the bed, ensuring she is comfortable, safe, and secure.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: David extends his hand toward the object, misses it at first, and momentarily loses sight of it. Spotting it again, he tries once more, but it eludes him. On his third attempt, he reaches out determinedly and finally manages to grasp it securely in his hand. Above him, bright lights illuminate the surface of the pool, shining down intensely. With effort, David struggles to the surface of the water, desperately clinging to the pole for support. As he reaches the pool's edge, he releases his grip on the pole and uses his free hand to claw his fingers over the edge, trying to find a hold. The pole, now unsupported, slides away from him as David clings grimly to the pool's edge for a brief, tense moment. Summoning his strength, he hauls himself out of the water and begins the laborious task of crawling painfully and slowly away from the edge, each movement a struggle. Nearby, two children stand a few paces away from him, their clothes soaked from the rain as they silently watch his progress. The pole now lies on the ground, positioned between the children. Rising to his feet, David stands and takes a moment to look at the children, acknowledging their presence. Meanwhile, liquid splashes onto the woman's wrists, which are bruised and bloody, tightly bound by twists of wire. The large maintenance man looms over her menacingly, a beer bottle in hand. He spits a stream of liquid at her bruised face, adding further to her discomfort. David approaches the man stealthily from behind and swiftly throws his left arm around the man's neck, using his other hand to clamp down on his own wrist, securing the chokehold. The man reacts with panic, clawing at the constricting arm around his neck and violently slamming David backward into the bedroom wall. The impact is forceful enough to leave a noticeable dent in the plaster. Despite this, David maintains his relentless grip on the man's throat. The man retaliates by jabbing David viciously in the ribs with his elbow and attempts to lift him again in a bid to escape the hold, but David's arm remains firmly in place around his throat. The man staggers across the room, lifting and twisting David as he tries desperately to dislodge him. Their struggle continues as they reel across the room, and the man smashes David into the wall again with force. He thrashes about wildly, pulling with all his might at the arm locked around his neck, and makes another backward rush into the wall in a final attempt to break free. Exhausted and overpowered, he falls forward onto his knees, trying to recover his balance. David seizes the opportunity to drag him back down to the floor, tightening his grip and yanking against the man's neck with increased pressure. Overwhelmed, the man sinks to the floor, and David finally releases the now inert form, allowing the maintenance man to fall face down, motionless and defeated. With urgency, David crosses to the woman and quickly works to untwist the wire binding her wrists, freeing her from her restraints. Once free, her arms fall limply downward, her body showing signs of exhaustion. David steps back and watches as the woman slumps sideways onto the floor, her body limp and unreacting. Taking a moment, he stands over her, still donning his cape, and gazes down at her with contemplation. Gently, David opens a nearby closet door. Within the shadowy light of the room, Audrey's sleeping body, dressed in a white nightdress, is visible. Carefully, David carries her from the dim confines of the room out into the brighter light of the hall. As they emerge into the light, Audrey opens her eyes and raises her head while David carries her up the staircase. She regards him with a faint smile, her long, fair hair cascading back from her white forehead as the light outlines her profile with a silver gleam, emphasizing her aquiline features. Her gaze remains fixed steadily on him as he carries her along the landing and into the bedroom. With care, he lays her softly onto the bed, ensuring her comfort and safety.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
David initially struggles but eventually manages to grasp the pole. As he reaches the surface, bright lights from above illuminate the pool. Clinging to the pole, he releases it to pull himself over the pool's edge. With determination, David hauls himself out and painfully crawls away, observed by two rain-soaked children standing nearby, with the pole lying between them. He stands and regards them briefly before turning his attention to a nearby scene.

The maintenance man looms over a woman, tormenting her with liquid splashes while her bruised wrists remain bound by wire. David stealthily approaches from behind, locks his arm around the man's neck, and restrains him with determined pressure. Despite the man's violent attempts to shake David off, including slamming him into the wall and jabbing him in the ribs, David maintains his grip. Their struggle takes them across the room, where the man falls to his knees under David's relentless hold. In the final moments, the man collapses, motionless, as David releases him.

David then moves to the woman, swiftly freeing her wrists from the wire, only for her arms to fall limp as she slumps to the floor. He stands over her, contemplating for a moment before gently opening a closet door. He carries Audrey, asleep in a white nightdress, through the dimly lit room and up the stairs, where she awakens and smiles faintly at him. Her serene expression is accentuated by the light that highlights her features. David carries her into the bedroom, gently laying her on the bed.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: David reaches for it, loses it, sees it again, and at the third attempt, grasps it. Above the pole, bright stadium-style lights, designed to illuminate the entire area, shine into the pool. David struggles to the surface of the community pool, clinging to the pole, a fiberglass model typically used for cleaning. He lets go of it to claw his fingers over the textured pool edge, providing a better grip for safety. The pole slides away into the water, and David hangs on grimly for a moment before hauling himself out of the water with the effort of someone exhausted from a long struggle and crawling painfully slowly away from it. The two children, who had been playing nearby before the rainstorm started, are standing a few paces away, drenched by the rain, watching him. The pole is lying on the ground between them, having been tossed aside in the struggle. David stands and looks at them, their curious eyes on him. Liquid splashes onto the woman's bruised and bloody wrists, which are tightly bound by twists of industrial wire, often used in construction for binding steel rods. Looming over her, beer bottle in hand, the huge maintenance man, known to locals for his intimidating presence, spits a stream of liquid at her bruised face, further degrading her. David closes on him from behind, throws his left arm around the man's thick neck, and clamps his wrists with his other hand. The man tears at the choking arm, and slams David back into the bedroom wall, creating a dent in the plaster wall, a clear sign of the ongoing struggle. The man tries to throw him off, but David, fueled by adrenaline, squeezes his throat relentlessly. The man jabs him viciously in the ribs with his elbow in a desperate attempt to escape, lifts him again, but can't escape the arm across his throat. He staggers across the room, lifting and twisting David, still trying to throw him off. They reel across the room and he smashes David into the wall again, this time cracking the plaster further. He thrashes about, pulling desperately at the arm locked around his neck, and makes another backward rush into the wall before falling forward onto his knees. He rises off balance and David drags him back down, using techniques learned from self-defense classes. He sinks to the floor and David tightens his grip, yanking against the man's neck. David throws off the inert form and the maintenance man falls face down, motionless, an eerie silence following the commotion. David crosses to the woman and quickly untwists the wire from her wrists with careful hands. When they are free, her arms flop down, completely drained of strength. David steps back and the woman slumps sideways onto the floor, limp and unreacting, likely in shock from her ordeal. He stands over her, still in his rain-soaked cape, gazing down at her with concern. David gently opens a closet door, revealing a small hidden space. Audrey's sleeping body in a white night dress, reminiscent of classic vintage styles, is carried from the shadowy light of her room to the foot of the stairs. She opens her eyes in the brighter light of the hall, and lifts her head as David carries her up the staircase, her trust evident in her knowing gaze. She watches him, smiling very faintly, her long, fair hair falling back from her white forehead, and the light making a silver line of her profile, emphasizing her aquiline features, as she stares steadily up at him with a hint of admiration. He carries her along the landing and into the bedroom, where he lays her softly on the bed, ensuring her comfort and safety in the familiar surroundings.

Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. He staggers across the room lifting and twisting David still trying to throw him off. They reel across the room and he smashes David into the wall again. He thrashes about pulling desperately at the arm locked around his neck and makes another backward rush into the wall before falling forward onto his knees. He rises off balance and David drags him back down. He sinks to the floor and David tightens his grip yanking against the man's neck. David throws off the inert form and the maintenance man falls face down motionless. David crosses to the woman and quickly untwists the wire from her wrists. When they are free her arms flop down. David steps back and the woman slumps sideways onto the floor limp and unreacting. He stands over her still in his cape gazing down at her. David gently opens a closet door. Audrey's sleeping body in a white night dress is carried from the shadowy light of her room to the foot of the stairs. She opens her eyes in the brighter light of the hall and lifts her head as David carries her up the staircase. She watches him smiling very faintly her long fair hair falling back from her white forehead and the light making a silver line of her profile emphasizing her aquiline features as she stares steadily up at him. He carries her along the landing and into the bedroom where he lays her softly on the bed.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: David reaches for it loses it sees it again and at the third attempt grasps it. Above the pole bright lights shine into the pool. David struggles to the surface clinging to the pole. let us go of it to claw his fingers over the pool edge. The pole slides away and David hangs on grimly for a moment before hauling himself out of the water and crawling painfully slowly away from it. The two children are standing a few paces away drenched by the rain watching him. The pole is lying on the ground between them. David stands and looks at them. David steps back and the woman slumps sideways onto the floor limp and unreacting. He stands over her still in his cape gazing down at her. David gently opens a closet door. Audrey's sleeping body in a white night dress is carried from the shadowy light of her room to the foot of the stairs. She opens her eyes in the brighter light of the hall and lifts her head as David carries her up the staircase. She watches him smiling very faintly her long fair hair falling back from her white forehead and the light making a silver line of her profile emphasizing her aquiline features as she stares steadily up at him. He carries her along the landing and into the bedroom where he lays her softly on the bed.

David struggles to the surface clinging to the pole. She opens her eyes in the brighter light of the hall and lifts her head as David carries her up the staircase. She watches him smiling very faintly her long fair hair falling back from her white forehead and the light making a silver line of her profile emphasizing her aquiline features as she stares steadily up at him. He carries her along the landing and into the bedroom where he lays her softly on the bed.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Jeremy reaches for it, misses it, spots it once more, and at the fourth try, snatches it. Beneath the tree, dim lanterns illuminate the river. Jeremy struggles to the shore, gripping the tree, releases it to drag his fingers over the riverbank. The tree rolls away, and Jeremy clings desperately for a while before pulling himself out of the stream and stumbling painfully away from it. The three dogs are sitting a few steps away, soaked by the fountain, observing him. The tree rests on the sand near them. Jeremy rises and gazes at them. Oil drips onto the child's scratched and scarred ankles, tied loosely by loops of rope. Hovering over her, soda can in hand, the tiny gardener sprays a mist of oil at her scratched knees. Jeremy approaches him from the front, wraps his right leg around the gardener's waist, and grips his elbows with his other leg. The gardener tugs at the strangling leg, and bangs Jeremy forward into the study door. Jeremy’s chest leaves a crack in the wooden door. The gardener attempts to shake him off, but Jeremy tightens his grip fiercely. The gardener nudges him gently in the shin with his knee, raises him up once more, but can't break free of the leg around his waist. He stumbles across the garden, hauling and turning Jeremy, still attempting to shake him off. They lurch across the garden and he crashes Jeremy into the door again. He flails around, tugging frantically at the leg locked around his waist, and makes another forward charge into the door before dropping sideways onto his elbows. He rises unsteadily and Jeremy pulls him back down. He collapses to the grass and Jeremy strengthens his hold yanking against the gardener's waist. Jeremy pushes away the lifeless form and the gardener falls sideways, unmoving. Jeremy strides to the child and swiftly unloops the rope from her ankles. When they are untied, her legs droop down. Jeremy retreats and the child topples backward onto the ground, limp and unresponding. He stands over her, still in his robe, staring down at her. Jeremy quietly closes a window shutter. Marissa's resting figure in a blue night shirt is carried from the dim glow of her chamber to the base of the ladder. She opens her eyes in the brighter glow of the hallway, and raises her gaze as Jeremy carries her down the staircase. She observes him, grinning slightly, her long, dark hair cascading back from her pink forehead, and the glow outlining her profile, highlighting her rounded features, as she gazes intently down at him. He transports her along the corridor and into the patio, where he places her softly on the swing.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: David manages to grab a pole and surfaces from a pool, dragging himself out. Two children watch him, drenched by rain. Nearby, a woman’s wrists are bound with wire, and a maintenance man menaces her with a bottle. David stealthily approaches and subdues the man by gripping his neck, despite being slammed into a wall repeatedly. David eventually overpowers the man, who collapses motionless. He frees the woman, who falls limp to the floor, and stands over her, observing in silence. David finds Audrey asleep, carries her gently upstairs, and lays her on a bed. Audrey wakes, offering a faint smile as she observes David, her features softly illuminated.
